name: gaius
short_description:
GAIUS is an data centric automation framework.

Core is the RTPS protocol (Real Time Publish Subscribe, see IEC/PAS 62030 (2004)) and a time triggered / event triggered paradigm with variant data transport, client side supported for C/C++ and Python.
